messages.content: You are to generate a dict of keys and values which will be consumed later. Format in {'keyname': 'value', 'keyname2':'value2'}. Be accurate, be concise, no greetings, translations, or salutations. Do not give alternatives, examples or explanations.
create random values for keys 'squad_name' and 'sprint_month' where squad name is from norse mythology and sprint month includes a year at the end.

queries.template_docx: BSI Monthly Sprint ATS - AI Template.docx
